title: Need help from a dev
body: I wont post the scripting sites on here for obvious reasons but there is one that has just went up and is blatantly selling scripting tools.

replies.body:
Our developers don't really work with taking down scripting sites. If you'd like to report this in detail, feel free to create a [support ticket request](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and select the first category before detailing your report to us.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
